cyclone.name: GORDON
cyclone.current_location: about 275 miles ESE of Marathon, Florida
cyclone.trajectory: tracking west-northwest across the Florida Keys Monday, then into the southeastern Gulf of Mexico toward the central Gulf Coast
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: central Gulf Coast (roughly Alabama-Florida border to southeast Louisiana)

weather_observation.watch_coast: Alabama-Florida border westward to east of Morgan City, Louisiana, including Lake Pontchartrain and Lake Maurepas
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Florida Keys and South Florida; central Gulf Coast from Alabama-Florida border to southeast Louisiana
weather_observation.wind: Tropical-storm-force gusts (30–40 mph) possible Monday afternoon and evening
weather_observation.storm_surge: None expected on the southeast Florida coast
weather_observation.rainfall: 2–4 inches expected with isolated amounts up to 8 inches possible across South Florida; flash flooding risk
